posts.post_content:
I am looking to grow my collection of signed T206 cards.  Below is my current list of available trade material for signed T206 cards.  Most of these cards would be very hard for me to part with, but if the right trade presented itself I would move them.

Email me at [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if you wanna trade...

Signed T206 (10 Total)
Double-signed (front/back) Zack Wheat
Larry Doyle Throwing (two different, SGC 40 and SGC 30)
Larry Doyle Batting
Marquard Hands at Sides (two different, one is an EPDG back)
Marquard Throwing (vintage signature)  
Snodgrass Batting (two different)
Paddy Livingston

Signed T201
Wheat
Leifield
Rucker

Signed E95
Larry Doyle

Signed E96
Marquard

Signed T205
Walsh

Signed 1961 Golden Press
Grove

Signed 1961 Fleer
O'Doul

Signed Callahan
Mack

Signed 1920 Strip Card
Roush
How much for the Roush??? I know you bought it cheap!!!:D

[quote name="CFSodano" post=921670]How much for the Roush??? I know you bought it cheap!!!:D[/QUOTE]

Not for sale, only for trade -- and it wasn't particularly "cheap" either!
